# SCNPhysicsBodyType

**Enumeration**

Constants that determine how a physics body interacts with forces and other bodies, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsBody/type] property and when creating a physics body.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SCNPhysicsBodyType
```

## Constants

- **SCNPhysicsBodyType.static**: A physics body that is unaffected by forces or collisions and cannot move.
- **SCNPhysicsBodyType.dynamic**: A physics body that can be affected by forces and collisions.
- **SCNPhysicsBodyType.kinematic**: A physics body that is unaffected by forces or collisions but that can cause collisions affecting other bodies when moved.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Defining How Forces Affect a Physics Body

- **physicsShape**: An object that defines the solid volume of the physics body for use in collision detection.
- **type**: A constant that determines how the physics body responds to forces and collisions.
- **velocityFactor**: A multiplier affecting how SceneKit applies translations computed by the physics simulation to the node containing the physics body.
- **angularVelocityFactor**: A multiplier affecting how SceneKit applies rotations computed by the physics simulation to the node containing the physics body.
- **isAffectedByGravity**: A Boolean value that determines whether the constant gravity of a scene accelerates the body.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
